welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful North Miami, known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miami International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Miami International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal at Miami International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and corporate jets.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Southwest, Allegiant, and Silver Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue, Frontier, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines and Bahamasair.

wifi.note: This free WiFi service is available throughout the airport.
